website_summaries.verdict: This cozy, heavy-duty inflatable bed works with crib sheets and includes a convenient bumper frame.
pros: Velvet-flocked mattress fits inside inflatable bumper frame
Thick vinyl reduces chance of puncture
cons: May arrive with an odor, but it fades over time

customer_reviews.title: Expected Better - Feeling Deflated
customer_reviews.text: For the price I'd expect for our travel mattress to not already have 4 patches on day 4 of our 9 day trip. Pretty disappointed and so was my son when he woke up on the hard floor at 3:00 am. Boo! Edit- Seller reached out to me within a half hour of my review offering a full replacement to be sent to our vacation spot. Not often you get service like that! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Tim McConnell

customer_reviews.title: Good concept, defective product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for our child to take on vacation. The first night we needed it I discovered a hole in the mattress. It is completely useless and won’t hold air. Very disappointing. I emailed the company asking for a replacement and have not heard back. Update: great customer service. The company responded and is sending me a replacement inflatable mattress. They assure me that this is a very infrequent problem and they stand by their product. Good company and a must have bed for any traveling family.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Love this company!
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome inflatable bed! Powerful inflation, less than one minute to assemble, sturdy, comfy, and big enough to last my four year old a few years! Deflated and folded up in just a few minutes...and actually has a bag big enough to fit it after it was folded less than perfectly :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Inner Tube Inflation does not hold up to 35 lbs
customer_reviews.text: Got this for our 2 year old toddler. She is at most 35 lbs and for 2 nights, the inner tube deflated during the night. Had to reinflate the inner tube each night. She also woke up earlier each of those mornings, probable because she was uncomfortable from the deflated tube. Outer tube held up perfectly. We looked for holes, or leaks and tested for defects...couldn't find any...but the inner tube simply did not hold up. Contacted Amazon support about this, heard no answer so decided to leave a review about our experience.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Darling

customer_reviews.title: Would not stay inflated. Total disappointment.
customer_reviews.text: This was awful. The idea is great and the bed seemed perfect.... but after filling it and setting it up in our hotel room we got back that night to a deflated mattress. We filled it again hoping we could still use it, and sure enough it deflated within a few hours. This ruined our first night on vacation and we had to run out and buy something else for our toddler instead. There were no visible holes, no reason for it not to work! Extremely disappointed, especially after dishing out a pretty penny. Returning this item ASAP.
customer_reviews.author: Allen de Castro

customer_reviews.title: Love this bed, great value for the money!
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase! Bought it for my 18 mo old grandson to sleep in for a couple of weeks while he stayed with us. Since he's a little young to transition into a big kid bed, I was concerned he may not sleep in it but he loves it! He lets the whole family know that it's his bed...goes right to bed at naptime and bedtime with no fuss. Super easy to inflate and stays inflated. Perfect size, worth the cost!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hiccapop was defective. Avoid this product and company.
customer_reviews.text: Worked fine for a few weeks then mattress developed a leak in the seam which was unpatchable. Probably poor manufacturing. Seller said they would replace mattress portion after we showed that we sliced the defective one. We sent up a picture immediately showing that we sliced it open per their instruction. They stopped responding now and we have emailed twice. Avoid this company. Terrible customer service and complete waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Emura

customer_reviews.title: We Love This Thing!
customer_reviews.text: What a perfect little “nest” for our 2-year-old granddaughter! We are fortunate enough to have both of our granddaughters overnight on a regular basis, and the 2-year-old has outgrown the pack ’n’ play. Our daughter and son-in-law got a Hiccapop some time ago and they absolutely rely on it. Now, so do we. The instructions are amusing and easy to follow, and the air pump is a dream -- this mattress inflates in the blink of an eye. Since the Hiccapop takes standard crib sheets, there was no need to buy anything else. The price was more than fair and it arrived on time. We’re so happy we bought a Hiccapop.
customer_reviews.author: Denise A. Kantner

customer_reviews.title: Works well but do not expect the Lifetime Warranty to be honored
customer_reviews.text: The mattress works great for my 20 month old. The only problem is we’ve had two failures - one at the valve and one along those grooves on the face of the mattress (pointed out as a weak spot by someone else in their review). With the first failure, we notified the seller and they sent a replacement. On the second failure, we notified the seller and they said they would send a replacement. We never received a replacement (not even sure they sent one) and they stopped answering my emails. We've had the mattress for less than 6 months and it didn't last and the lifetime warranty was not honored. BEWARE!
customer_reviews.author: KC Angeles

customer_reviews.title: 2 out of 3 not good
customer_reviews.text: This bed was purchased as a replacement for the same bed that arrived with a leak . The customer service was good. We bought this bed because we had purchased the same bed a few months earlier and it was great. We now after about three months due to the Covid virus we were finally able to use the bed. Hours after putting my granddaughter to be on it she had awakened us because once again the bed was totally deflated. The window to return it for another bed has closed. Very disappointed. Not an inexpensive purchase. So we have purchased three beds, two of which had leaks on the first use. Wouldn’t take my chances again on this product.
customer_reviews.author: MiMi

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my toddler and excellent customer service
customer_reviews.text: Our three-year-old loves it and slept comfortably on it every night for a a week-long vacation. It's big enough that I think it would work for most kids in the 2-6 age range. I especially like that it came with a storage/tote bag that's actually big enough to hold the bed and pump easily. Hiccapop's customer service was amazing. I *thought* there was an issue with the first bed they shipped me--though it turned out to be something I was doing wrong when inflating the bed--and they shipped a replacement to our vacation house within 24 hours of me contacting them.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: It could have just been this one....
customer_reviews.text: ....but I returned it because I wasn't enjoying having to fill it up with air every other day. This inflatable was going to be used for an extended period of time and it simply wasn't holding the air in. It's possible that it had a small, undetectable leak but I honestly didn't bother with it and returned it. The vendor was not the issue... the product was.
customer_reviews.author: Scorpio27

customer_reviews.title: Highly reliable, a little large but works great!
customer_reviews.text: We've really valued having this product, for which there doesn't seem to be any comparison on the market. It has allowed us to travel and sleep in hotel rooms/friends houses/airbnb's without worrying about accommodations. We usually use this with a zipsheet because we don't worry about him rolling off. He has at times moved up off the mattress (off the top). What can you do? At least he's on the floor! We've used this many times and have had no issues or problems. Will say, it is a bit large and does fit most of a suitcase. By the time you are using this hopefully no longer using diapers so you at least have the space in your bag?
customer_reviews.author: Claire

customer_reviews.title: Some kids don’t like inflatable mattresses
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the product seems very good, but we used it once and our 2 year old son woke up 3 hours later and didn’t go back to sleep for several hours. It seems that the movement of an inflatable mattress was unsettling to him. And the sidebars while were a good height, didn’t help when he was going over the edge at the head of the mattress where there isn’t one. The next night he slept on a regular mattress on the ground, he slept like a baby (no pun intended.)
customer_reviews.author: KWN

customer_reviews.title: Air leak and a ruined night of sleep
customer_reviews.text: I was happy with this product. The mattress isn’t super thick but my toddler didn’t mind. It was quick and easy to set up. Overall I liked this until the mattress lost all air in the middle of the night on our second trip and maybe the 6th time overall using this. It’s never been on anything sharp so I have no idea how it deflated, but I woke up to a very unhappy toddler and now I’m scrambling to find a different sleep option for my child on our trip.
customer_reviews.author: T. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Love this mattress!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely LOVE this mattress! It has been our travel companion for 1.5 years for our toddler - it is a winner for sure!! We never let him jump on it, however, it has withstood sliding and dancing and everything else. Unfortunately, last night the mattress portion deflated in seconds due to a slit at the seam in the center. We bought this brand as people raced on the customer service - so we are crossing our fingers on the lifetime guarantee - standby for updates!
customer_reviews.author: julieannzimm

customer_reviews.title: Everything great minus valves
customer_reviews.text: Finally got to use it this week. This has been great once we figured out how to fix the valves to fill it. The pump worked well and filled it quickly. The sides are just tall enough that my 2.5 year old can't roll out. But he does still roll like crazy and managed to roll off the top. Still, so much better than the twin mattress with pillows to keep him contained (spoiler, it didn't haha).
customer_reviews.author: Kat K.

customer_reviews.title: slow leak--Update- great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this in May for travel in July. When we arrived at our destination, we were pleasantly surprised at how easy it was to inflate, and it travels nicely. Bought it for my two year old son who loves the idea of his own toddler bed for travels. The poor rating is due to that fact that we noticed that there was a slow leak, which requires the bed and bumper to be refilled everyday, which is a pain. I contacted the seller, and after providing the above information, they sent a replacement right away. Fantastic Customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Gee

customer_reviews.title: Made traveling with kids SO much easier!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these from a recommendation from a blog that I follow. They made traveling with our two young kids SO much easier. No sharing a bed, no paying for a rollaway cot, or trying to make the kids share a bed (they won't). These were small enough when packed to easily bring them with us including their pump, and they inflated in minutes. The kids loved them, slept and napped like dream. Worth every penny. My 3.5 and 5yo will edefinitley be able to use these for many more years (I was concerned about the 5yo not being able to use it for long, but she will easily be able to use it for a while).
customer_reviews.author: ARene

customer_reviews.title: Great for Travel
customer_reviews.text: I have a 2 year old who I don’t trust to stay in a queen sized bed when traveling. My biggest concern is him falling out the bed. So I got this inflatable and he immediately fell in love. After jumping on it for the first 10 minutes, he finally calmed down enough to sleep on it. Best thing is, he didn’t cry through the night like he normally does. Perhaps this inflatable helps him sleep better than his regular bed.
customer_reviews.author: Joanna

customer_reviews.title: No problems so far- kids seem to like it
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. We've inflated the bed and let the kids lay on it, but not for a full night. I like that pump was easy to use, the bed inflated quickly and easily. Having two pieces adds a level of versatility to the product that I can see being useful in the future (using just the insert or just the exterior portion separately). I like that a normal crib sheet will fit too. I'll update once the kids actually try to sleep on it, but I'm pleased thus far. This is a little heavy, but compact, so I think it will be good for travel.
customer_reviews.author: Amy M.

customer_reviews.title: Worked Wonderfully
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for our granddaughter's visits. She's 2 1/2 and bitty little thing - but very active. We bought this bed to go on top of the double bed in the guest room - (she climbs up and down just fine when she's awake). I lined it with a soft blanket and she just melted into it. I didn't have to worry about her rolling or staying warm. Slept soundly all night and woke up full of energy and raring to go. (Do you make these in adult sizes?) It was way worth the money spent and I expect to get many good years out of it. Thank you very much.
customer_reviews.author: Lynne

customer_reviews.title: No pump included!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this bed to take on an international trip because it is the lightest option for a travel bed and we bought this one because it has an electronic pump included. It arrived and there is no pump included! So disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Raffaella Falchi

customer_reviews.title: Mattress leaked
customer_reviews.text: On the first day of a long visit with family, the toddler decided he'd had enough of the pack'n'play, and crawled out. This was a perfect way to get him used to sleeping on a mattress on the floor, and the size was perfect. After a few weeks, we had to patch the mattress in two spots. Not long after, however, it stopped holding air altogether, and would be flat by morning. The pump still works great, however. The two-piece bed and bumpers are a clever solution for little kids, but the $30 twin-sized air mattress I bought off the shelf of a big box store held up better.
customer_reviews.author: LadyLa

customer_reviews.title: Ripped
customer_reviews.text: This mattress was great.... the 3 times we used it. Unfortunately it’s already ripped and can no longer be used. Last time we used it we folded it up and put in the bag... about a month ago. We packed it on our most recent trip, pulled it out and the mattress was ripped where the air hose connects. There was no roughing it up or anything... just ripped fabric from no apparent cause. We bought it only 5 months ago and for the price I was really expecting it to last at least a couple years. Guess I’m back on the market for a travel bed ☹️
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great/Smart travel purchase!
customer_reviews.text: This baby is great!! We got it to take to family homes for Christmas visits and my expectations were met and exceeded! I’m so appreciative that the inner mattress is crib mattress size so I don’t have to buy special sheets etc. we could use a set our daughter knows and was comfortable in. She slept all night and I didn’t lose sleep knowing she wouldn’t fall out of the bed. The bed and rails are super compact when deflated and fit with room to spare for the pump and bedding in the travel bag. Great purchase!! We will totally be using this for vacation.
customer_reviews.author: Spiritedwynd

customer_reviews.title: These are awesome. Just buy them already.
customer_reviews.text: We live in St. Louis and are taking a road trip for spring break. Bought two of these beds for our 5 yr old and 2.5 yr old for the hotel. Pumped them up at home to test them out and to show the kids and they love them already. Our 5 yr old is 4ft tall and fits on the bed just fine. Our 2.5 yr old is 3ft tall and loves the edges on the bed so he doesn't roll off. Totally portable. Easy to inflate, deflate and fold up into the bag. Just buy them already. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: mlcs

customer_reviews.title: Warranty is top notch!
customer_reviews.text: We've had this bed for awhile and my kids love it. Recently, it started leaking and we needed to use the lifetime warranty. These guys have the best customer service. From thr time I emailed them to the time they sent me a new one took all of about 12 hours. Super fast responses and extremely friendly.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last very long
customer_reviews.text: Setup was a piece of cake and the kid loved it...except it quickly developed multiple holes in seams (on the mattress portion). Was bummed I had to toss it. Maybe I had a bad unit?
customer_reviews.author: AWDV8

customer_reviews.title: Buy it. Buy it right now.
customer_reviews.text: This mattress is exceptional. We've used this more than the pack-and-play for our toddler since we got it. Sleepovers are so much easier without having to lug the HUGE, HEAVY pack and play with us. Its great for the fun parent game nights and when we think about going to hang out with friends, having to pack the Hiccapop inflatable mattress makes it so much easier to get out of the house and be social. Why are you still reading this review? Go. Add it to your cart, right now.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Davidson

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my 2 year old as a travel bed! Nighttime is our biggest struggle while traveling, between the bedtime fight and waking up in the middle of the night. We told her this was her special bed and she went down as easy as home. She slept through the night every night too. This is a perfect trasition once they've outgrown the pack n play but aren't yet ready for an adult bed. I wasn't worried about her rolling out and clearly she was comfy. We used it for 8 nights straight and never had to reinflate.
customer_reviews.author: Candice Shulko

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend! Love love love.....
customer_reviews.text: Love love love! Now we don’t worry about our little one using recycled cribs at hotels. We just bring our own sleep accommodations . It’s compact and travels well. It fits nicely in a large luggage. Inflation is easy. We were going on a trip and taking the car seat and pack and play just seemed like a lot for a flight! We were able to consolidate with this baby making the trip a lot smoother. The high walls keep the little ones from rolling on to the floor! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Eve P.

customer_reviews.title: I thought this would be better quality
customer_reviews.text: I've had the Hiccapop for my daughter just over 1 year now. It's excellent for traveling, however, not as durable as I thought. That's why I am giving it 2-stars. The center blowup portion developed a hole recently and I cannot locate it for repair...not even after submerging it in the bathtub. I thought this product could withstand constant travel and an excited toddler but it failed to do so. I tried Hiccapop's website for help but I'm not sure what the warranty is on this or if Hiccapop can fix. Just beware when purchasing that this may not be a long-term item.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Araujo-Lipine

customer_reviews.title: Good while it lasts
customer_reviews.text: Great travel bed for toddlers. It's very easy to set up, doesn't take up a lot of space stored or inflated, and takes only a few minutes to assemble and disassemble. Our kids have slept well in it and not fallen despite being active wrigglers in their sleep. The major downside: we've only used this bed maybe 5 trips and all of a sudden the inner mattress keeps deflating. Overnight it's lost a significant amount of air. I haven't been able to find a hole so I can't even fix it. it's just deflating halfway throughout the night.
customer_reviews.author: CAMONY

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT!!!!! comfortable, simple.. sustainable like new through rough jumps of two kids.
customer_reviews.text: 2019 update after more than a year of heavy use: We bought two beds for our grandchildren to avoid the risk of rolling from our adult guest beds. The bed has built in sides protectors that prevent rolling to the floor. It has a separate mattress and a small but powerful electrical pump. It takes 10 minutes to inflate/deflate. We have used it for numerous weekends. It sustained like new through wild jumps rituals. THI
customer_reviews.author: Average Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Quality Toddler Travel Bed
customer_reviews.text: I just purchased this bed for my grandchildren when they come to visit. We haven't used it yet, but did a trial run to inflate it. We are so glad that we spent the extra money to purchase a bed with the electric inflator included. It is extremely easy and quick to inflate and deflate. We also purchased a crib sheet and it fits perfect. We an anxious to try it. I do wonder, however if you would want a mattress pad or towel to cover the grooves in the mattress. We shall see when the kids come what they think. A quality product, easy to inflate and equally convenient to store and travel with.
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel!
customer_reviews.text: We can blow this up in just a couple minutes. Our son (2.5 year old) has no issues sleeping on this, even after we've switched him to a full-sized bed at home. We take weekend trips a lot and have never had to add more air to it over the course of the trip. I really like the large plug which helps packing up go much faster. To really get all the air out, I open the plug to get the bulk of the air out, re-plug it then use the reverse on the pump to get the rest
customer_reviews.author: Brady Delperdang

customer_reviews.title: Awesome travel bed!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome travel bed! We bought this for my two year old and took it on our family trip. She is a little too big for the packnplay and we wanted something we would be able to use for a while. This worked perfect. It inflates quickly and is comfortable, just need a crib sheet to throw on it and you're good to go. Definitely worth the money to purchase this if you are in need of a travel bed for kids. When not traveling we use it at the in laws for her to stay the night or take a nap.
customer_reviews.author: Miranda Gomez

customer_reviews.title: Easy and quick setup, very high quality
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the bed is top of the line. The built-in safety bumpers are perfectly positioned. The removeable mattress made changing bedding a snap. We worried about using an inflatable and having leaks. We did have one leak in the mattress within the first year after our 3-year-old grand-daughter was jumping on it, but since it was lifetime guaranteed we contacted the company and in less than a week we had a replacement mattress. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Great blow up toddler bed
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this bed before heading to vacation in a town that did not have a baby rental company. My 2 year old is too little for a bed and too big for a pack-and-play. This was great. The sides are soft, but just high enough to make up for the crib walls. Also, i love the full toddler-sized mattress. We will use it regularly, when traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Katie V

customer_reviews.title: Works very well, my toddler liked it
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this for a family vacation. We had looked at the option of using a rental service for a toddler bed but this was the same price and we figured we could use this more than once. I am happy with this purchase, my son (2.5) liked it and slept well. I lay down next to him until he falls asleep and there was plenty of room for me to do that. I wish it had the bumpers at the head of the bed too because he tends to sleep up toward the top of his bed and I worried his pillow would fall off a couple of times but it didn't. That is a very minor thing though.
customer_reviews.author: Julianne L.

customer_reviews.title: Very Useful
customer_reviews.text: We use these beds for kids aged 2-7 and they work perfectly for travel and sleepovers. I will say, after about 2 years of (a lot of) use, the inner mattresses started to develop holes at the seams. I have never had an inflatable mattress last that long anyways, but the five star review is for the customer service response to these holes. They sent me new mattresses right away with zero hassle.
customer_reviews.author: mlreede

customer_reviews.title: Product description and customer service.
customer_reviews.text: This is, without a doubt, a product well worth purchasing. Over the holidays, we had our son, his wife and their nearly three year old daughter visiting from Hawaii. Our granddaughter loved her bed, and her parents intend to purchase this bed for her when they return home. One of the most impressive things about this company is their customer service. We had an issue with the mattress that was immediately resolved. This is a top notch company, and I could not possibly give them/it less than five stars. HIGHLY RECOMMEND!
customer_reviews.author: L. Warren

customer_reviews.title: Hiccapop Mattress is awesome
customer_reviews.text: I was a little dubious about getting this mattress for my new grandson. But as he is almost 1, and very active, I just don't trust putting him in a big bed with rails. So I purchased this and it is perfect. He loves sleeping on it and has taken many naps on it so far. I know it says for 18 months and older but if you don't leave them unattended I think it is perfect. Very roomy and sturdy. The insert-able mattress can be used alone or with the surround to keep him from rolling off. I think anyone with an active toddler would love this portable bed for their special little person.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn M. Ruth

customer_reviews.title: Great product and customer service
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these (1 per kid) about six months ago. I can fit both sets of mattresses, sheets, and pillows into a small carry-on suitcase for travel. One has held up perfectly. The other mattress developed a leak, and Hiccapop shipped a replacement within 24 hours of my reaching out to them, even all these months later. Very pleased with the product and believe we should be able to use it for several years yet.
customer_reviews.author: ennekube

customer_reviews.title: One of my favorite purchases
customer_reviews.text: This bed was perfect for my great niece who is 2 and her brother who is 8 months. I left it in my living room and we would lay the baby on it so he was off the floor. They were also able to lay together and watch a movie or just play with their toys on it as well. This bed seems stronger than the average inflatable beds you purchase in the store.
customer_reviews.author: KS

customer_reviews.title: Great Bed
customer_reviews.text: Finally put the pac and play away for grandson (3 in December), and got this. He loved it! first time sleeping outside a crib for nap. Slept a good hour more than usual. This will be perfect on the weekends he spends the night. I only gave it 4 stars for travel, not because we traveled, but probably won't be easy to put in the travel bag without a little effort. My son will be getting one too, most likely.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We'll see
customer_reviews.text: 2/27/2019: This arrived in the mail yesterday. I decided to do a test run, and inflated both pieces and leave them for 24hrs. No one has touched them since. Inflated almost entirely full, and 24 hrs later I can squeeze each piece with my hand into almost a fist. Not a quick leak, but I'm concerned that once it actually gets used (on our trip we leave for in 2 days) that it may not stand up to the rigors of a toddler sleeping on it. I'll report back with my findings.
customer_reviews.author: Kindseer

customer_reviews.title: Not as pictured
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these for my twins. I liked the fact that these were supposed to have four rails on it. Got the beds and they don’t have four rails! They just have the two on the sides. Don’t advertise four rails if you don’t sell them with four rails!! That was the only reason I went with these! 😡
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product and customer service
customer_reviews.text: So I bought 3 of these for my kids. Absolutely love them. Within maybe 6 months of kid use my kids popped one and just yesterday popped another. I reached out to the company about it popping and without hesitation they sent me a new mattress. I am going to try to patch up the second mattress. But the service I received was beyond exceptional.
customer_reviews.author: Mj

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer service
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my Grandaughter to sleep on when they come to visit in 2 weeks.Although I had some issues with the inner mattress I posted a bad review and the company immediately emailed me and sent me a new mattress which I was not expecting. Great Customer service ! Would definitely recommend this mattress ,perfect size for my almost 4 yr old Granddaughter and doesn’t take up a lot of space. When she leaves I will deflate and put in the nice storage bag it came with and put in closet till next time.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Holyko

customer_reviews.title: The BEST and top notch customer service!
customer_reviews.text: When we were searching for inflatable beds it was an overwhelming search. We saw the Hiccapop and decided to spend a little extra for quality and SO glad that we did. We have 3 boys so this bed gets its use. I love the side rails that keeps them in the bed and that there are two parts that inflate. It folds up easy and is durable. We had a leak in one and getting a replacement was easier than easy. This company stands by their product and I will forever be loyal to them because of it. Great company, great product and awesome design!
customer_reviews.author: Dylan Foreman

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE this air mattress
customer_reviews.text: LOVE LOVE LOVE this air mattress! This was a great buy. Super easy to use. Comes with air pump to inflate AND deflate. Perfect for a sleepover at grandparents or house or a vacation with my son. I have a pretty tall 3 (turning 4 in a month) and he fits great in this with still some room to grow. Super happy I bought this. I've had no issues, would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Leticia Franco

customer_reviews.title: Only used once and then it had holes
customer_reviews.text: Used on one vacation. Second vacation, my daughter woke up on it totally deflated. There’s two tiny holes in it from who knows where?!?
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Great Toddler Air Mattress
customer_reviews.text: High quality, easy to inflate with included pump. Easy for travel with included storage bag. Very comfortable for smaller toddler or kids maybe up to 5 years. Fits toddler bed/crib sheet. Raised edges make it so smaller kids can’t roll out easily. Smaller footprint than full size air mattress/doesn’t take up a lot of room. Didn’t deflate at all after a full week’s use.
customer_reviews.author: DTom

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: After occasional use of this mattress for a year we figured out it has a tiny puncture somewhere causing it to deflate the mattress. I contacted customer service on a Sunday to see if I can get a replacement mattress and they are sending a replacement bed. I'm blown away by the awesome level of service and same day responses on a Sunday.
customer_reviews.author: S. Driskill

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product and company
customer_reviews.text: I am typically one of those people that always read reviews, yet cannot be bothered to write one. Well, not in this case. First - the product is awesome. It is easy to blow up, fits all the sheets we already had, and durable enough to withstand my toddler treating it like a trampoline. Second - best customer service and warranty you will find. They completely stand behind their product, and replaced a part for us no questions asked. We like this so much we got a second one for kid #2 once they were old enough. Don't look anywhere else, this is perfect for camping, travelling, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Nate Smith

customer_reviews.title: Must have for a little one.
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for toddlers!! This is the best thing ever to have once your little one can’t sleep in a pack and play. A crib sheet mattress fits its perfectly. It comes with a pump and travel bag and takes maybe 60 seconds to get it all set up or take it down. Perfect to bring along and doesn’t take up any more space that a small bag would. He mattress part has a soft covering over it and is very comfortable. So glad we found this!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Great airmatress for travel.
customer_reviews.text: We just used this for the first time this last week. My 3-year old loves it but he did roll out the top a few times as he tends to move around a lot when he sleeps. I do wish they had bumpers for the top and bottom to help with this but seeing how the ground was carpeted, he didn't seem to mind. It just made for some interesting mornings as we never quite knew where he'd end up. It was very easy to blow up and pack away. Fit into my suitcase just fine.
customer_reviews.author: eana07

customer_reviews.title: It was very quick and easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old is too big for a pack and play. We bought this bed for our summer vacation. It was very quick and easy to set up. I love that it is crib size, so there was no need to buy special bedding. My son slept great all week. The bed was very quick and easy to deflate and the bag that comes with it holds the bed and pump equipment. This was well worth the money! It seems well made and we are sure it will get us by until our son is ready for a big bed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver
customer_reviews.text: After losing power from the recent tropical storm, we had to pack up and we brought our kids and grandkids to a hotel for a mini vacation. Luckily we decided to take the inflatable mattress that we had just purchased ! Our 3 year old grandson absolutely loved sleeping in it ! They didn’t have to worry about sharing the bed with him, he just laid down and got himself comfortable! I am so happy I decided to buy this for our house, I will tell everyone to get one!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Wasserman

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: We are a military family and constantly on the go. Our most current move requires us to live without our furnishings for 45 days. We were really worried how our five year old, who has special needs, would do without her usual bed. When the bed arrived and we set it up for her she immediately liked it. She has slept well each night since. We're really happy to have found such a great product. It is helping our transition immensely.
customer_reviews.author: Anita L.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect travel bed for a toddler! Great customer service.
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect travel bed for my 4 year old! It’s compact to travel with and super easy to inflate (you can even inflate it with your mouth in a pinch). My toddler sleeps soundly and I love that it is big enough and sturdy enough for us to do a bedtime story together in it. The Hiccapop customer service is awesome! They are super fast to respond and extremely helpful. They stand by their warranty. I wouldn’t hesitated to buy this bed again.
customer_reviews.author: Bashfulgrl

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with our purchase!
customer_reviews.text: We have been traveling with a 1 & 3 year old and this is PREFECT. There were some nights where we didn’t have access to our pack-and-play, so our 1 year old was able to use the “bumpers” as her bed to keep her contained, and our 3 year old was still able to sleep on the mattress piece. This packs up nice and small, about the size of the old 12 packs of soda (before they became long and skinny!) It is so quick and easy to inflate and to re-pack! Very happy with our purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Excellent! Works perfectly.
customer_reviews.text: This inflatable toddler bed is fantastic. I love that you can use your standard crib sheets so that your child can sleep on the same sheets they are used to. The inflatable "rails" are genius. Our toddler slept soundly the entire night the first time that we used it. I also like that it comes with a pump and its own bag so that everything is self contained and easy to pack. There is even extra space in the bag for bedding. A+, 5 stars, cannot say enough good things.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J Rowe

customer_reviews.title: Great product - lifetime warranty!
customer_reviews.text: This is an AWESOME product. I have two toddlers and a baby and we use these beds for going to grandmas house, the beach and we have even used them camping. The beauty is that the boys LOVE them and will literally sleep anywhere as long as we have them. The best best thing is that these have a LIFETIME WARRANTY. That takes the cake right there. No blow up bed will last forever but the customer service I have received when needing a replacement is excellent. I will likely buy a third one when baby girl gets big enough. This has been my top kid purchase so far. Great company!
customer_reviews.author: Jessie Foltz

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Product has been great so far! We’ve only used it on two occasions (4 nights) so far but it’s been great. Simple to inflate, and the separate mattress makes it very easy to put a crib sheet on. My 3yo daughter was excited to try it out, and when my nephews visited (4 and 5yo) they fought over who got to sleep on it. Luckily they stayed two nights, so each one got a turn ;) No complaints!
customer_reviews.author: KG

customer_reviews.title: Great travel bed
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my almost 2 year old for traveling to her grandparents. She never has slept well at all in her pack and play they have, so I was hoping this might work. She still sleeps in her crib at home so I wasn’t sure if this bed would work. It is amazing though! It come with everything you need including an air pump and carry bag. She slept through the night on this (provided she went to bed VERY late for her) and had no issues with it. So far this is an amazing purchase.
customer_reviews.author: C. Sprick

customer_reviews.title: This is a great inflatable toddler bed-easy to set up & easy to deflate for storage
customer_reviews.text: I loved everything about this bed but after 1 1/2 years there's a leak in the inner mattress and we can not get it to patch up for use...usually deflates in an hour. I've still given this product all 5 stars because for the time we've used it, it's been excellent and our granddaughter, now 4, loves it too. The Hiccapop company reached out and replaced my inner mattress because of it's guarantee! If I could give them 10 stars I would!!
customer_reviews.author: Peggy Wnek

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but love
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my two year old daughter when traveling. Small enough to throw in the car or even take as an airline carry on. Love that it comes with the pump and carry bag. I think it’s expensive in my opinion but we love it and as long as it holds up it’ll be worth it in the long run.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome, would buy again in a heartbeat.
customer_reviews.text: We just used this and it is great. Nice quality and very sturdy. Inflated quickly with included pump and deflates completely for storage. Was a great option to have in the hotel and fits a standard crib fitted sheet. It held up well even with me snuggling my son to sleep on it. He slept like a dream. My three year old is looking forward to our next trip to use it again! Would definitely buy again and will be a good option if my little ones stay overnight with grandma.
customer_reviews.author: KELLY

customer_reviews.title: Good quality. Easy to use. Great price!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this bed for my preschooler to sleep on during a family vacation. He loved it! He jumped on it, rolled on it, played on it...and slept on it with no issues. It was easy and quick to inflate and deflate. It comes with a compact air pump and a light travel bag. I packed it in a 20" suitcase for our flight, and there was plenty of room to spare for his clothes and supplies. Note: I would not use this for an infant. The bed has pillow stitching just like a beach raft. I would be concerned about a baby rolling over facedown and not being able to breathe. Just my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Pack n Play Alternative!
customer_reviews.text: My 16 month old hates pack and plays, so we were in search of an alternative we could take on our two week vacation to Europe. This fit in a carryon roller suitcase with room still for my child’s cloths and diapers. This was semi easy to inflate, (have to hold the air pump to the valve while inflating), fit a normal crib sheet, and was easy to deflate. My LO slept as well on this as she does in her crib at home, and we are super excited to continue using it on our travels. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Toddler Travel Bed
customer_reviews.text: Excellent toddler travel bed. Taken it on two trips and it worked perfectly. My girl moves around in her sleep, but screams bloody murder if we try to put her down in a pack n play. With this we get to avoid bed sharing, avoid screaming, and avoid worrying about my toddler falling off a big person bed. Be warned, it does take up significantly suitcase space. Even so, 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Travel Mattress and Amazing Customer Service!
customer_reviews.text: I can't say enough good things about my experience with this product and the company as a whole. The mattress itself is so perfect for travel with a toddler . It provides a safe space for them to sleep while also being so easy to travel with. We never travel without our travel bed for my 3 year old daughter. I'd also like to note their customer service is really impressive. I had a couple issue with my mattress. They assisted me immediately and made sure I was happy. Its not often that you see a company go to the lengths they did. I'm thankful for their quick assistance and will be a repeat customer for this reason.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa L

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy bed.
customer_reviews.text: I've not had a child sleep in the bed yet, but it was easy to blow up and stayed that way for several hours. This is my second portable toddler bed, the other brand just keeps deflating though no hole can be found. The hiccapop Inflatable Toddler bed feels sturdy and looks comfortable. It packed away nicely too. I will re-review after I've had one of my grandchildren sleep in it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just what we wanted for our grandkids to nap and sleep.
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous for our grandkids who are out of a crib but who are not quite ready to be trusted in a big bed. I blew it up the other day, it all works well and looks fabulous. The inner mattress fits snugly into the surrounding bumpers. I feel like it is very safe for 18+ toddlers. Looking forward to getting my 23 mo. old grandsons viewpoint when he sleeps in it. I also purchased the hiccapop bumpers as well because we have grandkids at many stages and they too are awesome and provide extra safety in a "big" bed. Great company!
customer_reviews.author: sharon galvin

customer_reviews.title: Wish we bought sooner!
customer_reviews.text: We bought two of these just before traveling to visit with friends. We have a four year old and a two year old. The two year old is still in a crib at home. The kids LOVED having their own beds. We travel quite a bit and the now two year old always ends up in our bed after a failed attempt with the hotel supplied cribs....not this trip. He slept all through the night and stayed in this bed after he woke up. Great quality and only wish we had purchased them sooner. Crib sheets and waterproof crib mattress covers fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Langfield

customer_reviews.title: Quality and comfort
customer_reviews.text: Have used one that we ordered with a tall 5 year old who is staying with us. He has used it for a month and so far it has worked great. The other one we blew up and there were no issues. Easy to inflate and the mattress coming out makes it an easy bed to make. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Аmazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product—14 month old slept like a dream!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for a vacation. My 14 month old dislikes sleeping in a pack n play and frankly doesn’t fit well anymore so we didn’t want to have to bother lugging one on the trip. We bought this instead. I had some reservations because he is still in a crib and this doesn’t have sides. But we put it in a corner on the floor in the house we were staying in and he slept great! He did not leave it—even in the mornings he waited for us to get him. Highly recommended. Going to take it to Europe with us in a few months!
customer_reviews.author: AML

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we needed!
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful air bed! It’s the perfect size for our almost 3 year old when she visited for Christmas. It’s very easy to inflate with the enclosed pump. We haven’t deflated it yet but it looks like it won’t be a problem since there is a reverse on the pump. We love that there is a separate mattress that a crib sheet fits perfectly and it fits snugly in the bed “frame”. We also like that there are sides on it so there’s no worry about her rolling off. Our granddaughter loves her little bed a we love the ease and versatility of it. Highly recommend it for a temporary bed for your little one!
customer_reviews.author: agdallas

customer_reviews.title: As described and expected
customer_reviews.text: I love that the mattress is similar in size to a toddler mattress. It's not as tall so there was a little extra fabric from the mattress cover but I just tucked it in. Easy to inflate and deflate. My kid was pretty excited for it. I like the low walls to help keep her in the bed (she moves a ton in her sleep).
customer_reviews.author: SARK9Handler

customer_reviews.title: Perfect replacement for port a crib for growing grand babies
customer_reviews.text: Our 2 year old grandson love sleepovers with Papa & Nana, even more now that he has his own big boy bed. Papa & Nana love that there’s no longer a port a crib to put up and take down. This toddler bed is so easy to inflate and deflate, especially with the included electric pump. Quick and easy to store. It holds air great, even withstands all 200 lbs of Papa. Great size too, little man has plenty of room to stretch out.
customer_reviews.author: Ana Zmolik

customer_reviews.title: INcredibly easy and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to be the bed our grandson sleeps in when he visits our house. The included blower that attaches to the input of the bed inflates the bed and the mattress in the bed in less than a minute each. So easy to wrap the mattress in a sheet. My 2.5 yr old grandson absolutely loved it the first time he saw it, and slept like a baby (!). This is exactly as advertised, so easy to use and so comfortable. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Brian F. Stephenson

customer_reviews.title: Overall a great product.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to use on vacation for our 2 year old who is 35 inches tall and 23 pounds. It is roomy enough for her with plenty of room to grow. The only issue we had is that she was able to roll off of it despite the humps which are meant to prevent that. She still sleeps in a crib though and rolls around frequently, so this may not be the case for everyone. The pump and the travel bag are also added bonuses; however, the travel bag is not durable and tore after the first use. Overall a great product.
customer_reviews.author: J. Sheridan

customer_reviews.title: Deflates
customer_reviews.text: Loved this product until after 5 nights it started deflating. Emailed company and haven't heard back. I didn't get a chance to register it tho because I got it and immediately went in vacation with it. Husband threw box away. Not sure if theyll replace without it being registered even tho they have 100% guarantee policy.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph J. Hamm

customer_reviews.title: GREAT customer service!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Although our initial inner mattress got a hole after three uses, I contacted the company and they are sending a replacement! I totally understand that sometimes the integrity of a product can vary, that’s just life, but you can’t beat great customer service! I’m happy that we will be able to continue using this bed because my toddler sleeps great on it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this toddler bed in the summer of 2018 for our grandkids to use when visiting. It was so easy to inflate, to store and our grandson slept great in it. This past visit, we noticed that the inside mattress was deflating slowly so by morning it was almost deflated. I remembered the "lifetime guarantee" and wrote to the company. I got an immediate response - they call themselves the "customer love team." That's exactly how it felt. I sent them the necessary information and the replacement was sent. All of this took about 4 days. I was so impressed. It's a great product and the company stands behind it.
customer_reviews.author: Martha Fischer

customer_reviews.title: Practical toddler bed for grandma!
customer_reviews.text: I blew it up and everything seems fine! It is for my grandson and he hasn’t been here, so we haven’t tried it out yet! I can’t say anything about durability since I just got it!
customer_reviews.author: Uks

customer_reviews.title: Love that it comes in two pieces
customer_reviews.text: We have another inflatable toddler bed, however the bed and the sides are connected. The problem is that if there is a leak in the old unit, it's hard to find because the two pieces are connected. IF there were a leak in the Hiccapop it would be easier to find and fix. Besides the fixing problem, having two pieces allows you to use the inside mattress in a smaller place, if needed. All in all, we're very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel and very durable
customer_reviews.text: My toddler absolutely loved using this bed. It was easy to assemble and I love that the instructions are written on the mattress so you don’t have to keep track of them. It is incredibly durable - it has withstood hours of my 2.5 year old bouncing on it.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn League

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! Loved this air mattress. It inflated so easily and actually even deflated when ready to store in seconds. Loved the storage bag they provided too. Both pieces went in easily. No need to shove or squish it in the bag. The material seems very durable. My 2 1/2 year old granddaughter looked so cozy and peaceful sleeping in it. I did inflate it a day in advance to let the fresh plastic smell air out and all was good. I’m super picky, and all I can say is I love this product. I’d do commercials! 😊
customer_reviews.author: Janet Woods

customer_reviews.title: Would not purchase again. Prefer intex
customer_reviews.text: Air seems to start leaking out somehow. I have to reinfkate it every once in a while. I prefer the intex inflatable. Not only did it seem more durable but also the outside of the bed encompasses my kids completely. My sons pillows always slip off of the hiccapop bed. Frustrating
customer_reviews.author: Cristina

customer_reviews.title: the comfort of my granddaughter have a good nights sleep
customer_reviews.text: disliked that the black plug is hard to remove in order to inflate,had to inflate cause this was bought for when my grand daughter comes to visit,and since it won't be for awhile i had to know if it would hold the air so for now it held up ,but didn't have any weight or movement in it since my granddaughter isn't here .But i like it it's sturdy and big hope she likes it when she sees it.Just hope the black plug doesn't cause any problems from have to remove it when we have to inflate,cause like i said it's pretty tight fit. If anybody knows an easier way to remove it Please advise,since that my only dislike.
customer_reviews.author: Lena

customer_reviews.title: Good Product Great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for my three year old to use when traveling. Its been great. She sleeps well. It travels and inflates easily. After about six months of use the inner-mattress split and we were afraid it was broken forever, however I reached out to the company and after sending pictures they apologized and sent a new mattress insert. I was super impressed with their customer service, would absolutely buy products from this company
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect travel transition from pack-n-play
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to keep at our house when our grandsons (ages 2 and 3) stay overnight since they have just about outgrown the pack-n-plays. We initially looked at side rails for regular beds and also at cots, but decided on the the hiccapop because it seems to have everything we need! Haven’t tried it out with the little ones yet, but we’ve inflated it (super easy!) and left it up to make sure there were no leaks. Uses a standard size crib sheet, which is great. Lifetime guarantee can’t be beat! Think we’ll love it!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bed for visiting grandchild!
customer_reviews.text: This bed was exactly what we needed for our visiting 2 year old grandchild. It is very easy to inflate and put a crib sheet on - less than 5 minutes and that includes reading directions:) It is also easy to deflate, fold and store - very compact. This was our grandchild’s first experience of not sleeping in a crib and all went well.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Great for daytime naps and waterproof!
customer_reviews.text: Love that this bed is safer than an actual bed for my 10 mo old granddaughter when I babysit. She used it at a friends house and sleeps well on it. Just wish it had sheets to fit but I just thru a quilted blanket over it and it worked fine. It does come with a warning for less than 18 month olds but we only use it for daytime naps.
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: A brilliant product! Great design. Glad we bought it!
customer_reviews.text: This bed is so great. We used it as a transition between crib and big kid bed. It also came in as a lifesaver when our kiddo was throwing up sick one night. She could be in our room with us, but still be in her own bed with her own pillows and blankets. And on the floor to make it easier to contain any 🤢. We are so thankful for this bed!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Don’t purchase - air leaks out
customer_reviews.text: I’m disappointed with this product. I purchased this mattress for my daughter for when we travel. I pumped the bed up last night for the first time and by morning it was deflated. Air it leaking from the mattress and it won’t hold its shape. Definitely not worth the money. Don’t buy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: hiccapop Inflatable Toddler Travel Bed with Safety Bumpers [4-Sided] | Portable Blow Up Mattress for Kids with Built in Bed Rail - Gray
feature_bullets: HOME, GRANDMA'S, CAMPING OR VACATION - hiccapop is for modern families on the go. The Original hiccapop inflatable toddler bed is lightweight, portable and offers a LIFETIME guarantee.  XL travel bag & electric turbo pump included.

ONLY 4-BUMPER TRAVEL BED - UNMATCHED QUALITY & DURABILITY - 4-bumper protection for maximum safety. hiccapop’s inlay-enforced™ vinyl is 40% thicker than its nearest competitor, making it virtually puncture-proof. Reinforced weld-seams and a heavy duty air valve insure against air leakage. And our velvet flocked mattress is the smoothest in its class, so your little one can sleep more soundly.

TRANSITIONAL BED - Kids cannot sleep in adult beds before they are 24 months old, yet most outgrow a crib at 18 months. So what do you do during those awkward 6 months?  The hiccapop travel bed is the perfect solution for those “tween times” that every parent dreads.  And when you’re done, use it for overnighters with friends, or better yet, your next little hiccapopper!
INFLATES IN UNDER 30 SECONDS -  Fits all standard crib sheets and blankets.  When it’s time to stow, simply fold, roll and go.

EXTRA TALL - EXTRA LONG BED RAIL BUMPERS FOR ADDED SAFETY - 25% taller & 25% longer than nearest competitor.  BPA, phthalate and lead free. EXCEEDS ALL FEDERAL STANDARDS FOR CHILD SAFETY. There is no safer travel bed on the market today at any price PUMP NOT COMPATIBLE OUTSIDE OF USA.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars345 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
